attributes.action: force all insurance companies to produce a disc to prove all drivers have insurance
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: this petition is asking for the prime minister to get all insurance companies to produce discs (like car tax discs) so all insured and taxed cars and lorries etc can be spotted quickly and all uninsured cars can be impounded and taken off the road....this system should be cheap quick and easy to enforce and introduce and would cut the amount of uninsured cars on the roads as all uninsured drivers would more likely be taken off the road
